app_descript:
FACTS Family

Brief

FACTS Family is a comprehensive mobile solution designed to streamline various aspects of educational management for families. The app provides a one-stop platform for parents to stay informed and engaged with their child's academic journey. From managing attendance to keeping up with billing and tuition, FACTS Family ensures that parents have all the necessary tools right at their fingertips.

Core Features

  • Announcements: Stay updated with the latest school news and important alerts. ğŸ“¢

  • Classes: Access detailed information about your child's classes and schedules. ğŸ“š
  • Calendar: Keep an eye on upcoming school events and important dates. ğŸ—“ï¸
  • Billing/Tuition: Conveniently manage and view billing information and tuition fees. ğŸ’³
  • Homework: Monitor assignments and homework to help your child stay on track. ğŸ“
  • Lunch: Check lunch menus and account balances, and manage meal plans. ğŸ¥ª

  • Student Schedule: Visualize your child's daily and weekly schedule. ğŸ•’
